title: API Failure Scenarios
body_html:
API Failure Scenarios

This page documents all failed attempts to update resumes via API, including payloads, error responses, and troubleshooting notes.

Bulk Update Failure

  • Endpoint: update_resume
  • Payload: Attempted to update all sections at once (summary, skills, work, education, languages, interests, projects).
  • Error: Validation failed (HTTP 400)
  • Observation: Fails even with correct schema; backend likely rejects bulk updates.

Section Update Failures

  • Sections affected: languages, projects
  • Endpoint: update_resume_section, update_resume
  • Payload: Tried single and multiple entries (with/without ids, visible fields, etc.)
  • Error: Validation failed (HTTP 400)
  • Observation: No format passes validation for these sections.

Mapping/Schema Issues

  • Observation: Successfully updating 'work' section returns success, but data appears under 'experience' in the backend. Direct updates to 'experience' not attempted yet.

Incremental Updates

  • Observation: Incremental updates for summary and skills worked; other sections consistently fail.

Next Steps

  • Investigate backend schema for section naming and required fields.
  • Try updating 'experience' directly instead of 'work'.
  • Check if any sections require pre-existing objects or specific IDs.
